page.title: 18Hobbies
page.content: When 40 residents were asked to name their favourite pastimes,the following replies were given. Gardening....................21 Watching television..........21 Do it yourself...............10 Reading.......................7 Fishing.......................6 Knitting,sewing,embroidery....6 Sport participation...........5 Walking.......................5 Watching sport................2 Music.........................2 Crosswords....................2 Photography...................1 Birdwatching..................1 Cooking.......................1 Shooting/hunting..............1 Young farmers club............1 Guiding.......................1 Wine and jam making...........1 Stamp collecting..............1
